the suicidal. We attempt to save the lives of the suicidal and to convince them
that they have made an error in judgment. This does not mean that the future
of an individual obtains value from the value that others confer on it. It means
that, in some cases, others can make a clearer judgment of the value of a per-
son’s future to that personthan the person herself. This often happens when
